name: Dead Wife Game
description:
DEAD WIFE GAME

"The first AAA Bitsy Game" - IGN

Good art by mark

Bad art and writing by me

"I don't want to be the object of our disdain. Just know that if you hate yourself, I hate myself twice as much. Can you see me now? Can you hear my voice? As a scream came across the sky, I thought "I don't wanna die""

Music is Ruth White - Gymnopedie no. 1
